body.p: This document describes how to get started with development of the Simal Web Module. It is intended for those users wishing to get their hands dirty with the source code .

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: You must have set up the prerequisites and downloaded the source for Simal Web.

section.title: Now What?
section.p: So you have Simal Web installed, now what?
Simal is a very early stage project, we need your help. We encourage you to join our mailing list .
